name: VIROPHAGE (unknown_patterns)
description:
He wants to believe the doctors infected him with a new strain of the virus...

-This is one part of the series I'm trying to write called ANTIVIRAL (the first chapter is published, but in spanish), about a post-apocalyptic world where the GA1-α virus has infected most part of the world population. 

-3 possible endings with 2 combinations. 

-Our character has a weird strain of the GA1-α virus, he has no vital signs, but he's still talking, walking, thinking...

P.S.: This game was written on Twine. I am not a native english speaker so the game might have some grammatical or spelling mistakes (if you can notify me where they are, I'll be greatful).

I hope you like the game. Thanks for playing!
